title: Broly46
author: Broly46
content: dumb people cheat, smart people scam the other, and zero sum.dumb people cheat the system, smart people scam the other people in the system. eventually the system return to zero sum because it is so broken, koolaid can't patch it anymore.in the school, dumb student could not get ahead in result, they often have to resort to cheating, by cheating the exam system, they can bring note into exam, and go to toilet as an excuse to cheat by reading the note in the toilet. (do not tell your kid to cheat with this tricks okey!)but smart people do not like to cheat in the exam, instead, smart people scam in the exam instead, obviously they have to scam someone else, who are they going to scam in the exam? They scam the teacher, they scam the examiner, just like how the banker scam the regulators. Look there is priviledged student who get easy pass in the exam, especially some gender almost always do better than the other gender by great margin, nobody wonder why such irregularity is allowed, btw it is tough to be teachers.it look like what we learn in school, we could make good uses of them in the job market too, ahahahaha, btw is it true money is just as stupid as examination and grade?So dumb guy cheat the test by acquiring doge instead of working hard for money(not working hard on the exam), smart guy scam other by making plethora of pump and dump coin (trying to work hard in the test). And some guy rather become housewives or house-nerd(basement dweller), which is basically retire permanently by rooting on a breadwinner or a rent for life support.but why want to try so hard to cheat and scam in a test? what is the reward in the end? May be getting a princess's blessing, may be a chance to marry Minnie mouse to have many little kids? Because being animal is very bad, animal do not work hard, they get to breed as hard and as many as they could without restrictions, animal can get fast house fast car and fast woman without working hard.
